introText: Welcome to our football team registration. Please fill out the form below to register your team for upcoming tournaments and matches.

questions.label: Please enter your Instagram ID for contact
How many players are in your team?

termsText: By submitting this form, you agree to follow all tournament rules and regulations.
rules: You will have to pay 2000 Rupees as entry fees
